business_model.pricing_strategy: Value-based pricing focused on privacy premium and advanced features. Free tier provides core envelope budgeting, premium unlocks analytics and advanced features.
business_model.value_justification: Privacy-first approach commands premium pricing. Users pay for data security, advanced insights, multi-device sync, and goal planning features that justify subscription cost.
business_model.competitor_pricing_analysis: YNAB at $14.99/month sets high-end benchmark. GoodBudget Pro at $7/month for basic envelope features. PocketLedger positioned at $8.99/month for comprehensive privacy-focused budgeting.

subscription_tiers.target_user_segment: Budget-conscious users testing envelope method, privacy-aware individuals wanting basic tracking
Privacy-conscious power users, families needing comprehensive budgeting, users wanting advanced financial planning

trial_strategy.trial_limitations: After trial, reverts to free tier with envelope and feature limits
trial_strategy.conversion_strategy: Progressive premium feature exposure during free use, clear value demonstration through analytics and receipt scanning during trial period

paywall_strategy.presentation_style: Native iOS/Android subscription UI with clear value proposition

subscription_transparency.clear_pricing: All prices displayed prominently with currency and billing frequency
subscription_transparency.trial_terms: 14-day free trial clearly communicated with automatic renewal notice
subscription_transparency.cancellation_policy: Easy cancellation through platform settings with confirmation

platform_compliance.app_store_guidelines: Subscription app compliance with clear value proposition
platform_compliance.google_play_policies: Subscription policy compliance with proper disclosure

privacy_monetization.data_usage: No user data sales or third-party monetization
privacy_monetization.privacy_premium: Clear messaging that subscription funds privacy-first development
